attributes.action: Distribute Free annual railpasses to all Teenagers in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should distribute free annual railpasses to teenagers in Scotland who are under the age of 18 and in full time education. There should be a reason why transport is called 'public transport' it should be free for all teenagers in full time education in Scotland.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
